radiographic_examinations.findings: Mural thickening of the sigmoid colon proximally with mild adjacent stranding; interval increase in size of a 4.1 x 3.2 x 6.3 cm collection containing predominantly air and fecal matter, previously measuring 3.7 x 3.3 x 4.3 cm.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Slight interval increase in size of the sigmoid colon collection.
